Package control

Class AppWindowController

java.lang.Object
control.AppWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This system is built on a single stage which means this controller contains all controls needed for the entire application. The application is split into a login window, a main window with a tab for appointments, customers, standard reports, and a filter building system with a help window, an add update window, and an add update customer window. The controls for the different windows are separated by sections.

  • Method Details

    • logInButtonClicked

      public void logInButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Sets up the initial functionality of the main window after the user enters correct login information pulled from the users table in the client_schedule database. Since all windows are built around a single stage, this window is toggled between visible and hidden as the user interacts with the interface. Lambda Expression: Using a lambda expression here eliminated the need to create a separate handler function to modify what happens when the application is close. Added closing the database connection when the app is closed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - User Event - Controls setOnCloseRequest preventing the user from closing the app while logged in.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Used to throw a sql exception controlled in the JDBC helper class.

    • aptStartDateFilter

      public void aptStartDateFilter()
      Refreshes the appointment table view if the Day, Week, or Month tabs are selected on the appointment tab.

    • runStandardReports

      public void runStandardReports()
      Refreshes the standard report by month table view on the standard reports tab.

    • runContactSchedule

      public void runContactSchedule()
      Filters the contact schedule standard report table view by selected contact in contact dropdown box on the standard reports tab.

    • aptReportWeekMonthToggle

      public void aptReportWeekMonthToggle()
      Controls the week/month radio button for the custom report builder.

    • aptReportSetLayerTwoSelector

      public void aptReportSetLayerTwoSelector()
      Sets the layer two value dropdown based on the layer two selector selection on the custom report builder.

    • aptRunReport

      public void aptRunReport()
      Sets values for the custom report builder table view base on the all-time results' checkbox, the week month toggle, the filter start date picker, the layer one value selected, and the layer two value selected. The layer one and two selections are optional.

    • aptReportReset

      public void aptReportReset()
      Resets the custom report builder to the default state.

    • aptReportHelp

      public void aptReportHelp()
      Displays the custom report builder help menu.

    • aptReportHelpClose

      public void aptReportHelpClose()
      Closes the custom report builder help menu.

    • aptFilterTabSelect

      public void aptFilterTabSelect()
      Filters the appointment table view values based on the all, day, week, or month tab selection in the appointments menu.

    • setFilterDateBlock

      public void setFilterDateBlock()
      Sets the filter start date to the current date if there is no date selected on the appointments tab.

    • setFilterToday

      public void setFilterToday()
      Sets the filter start date to the current date on the appointments tab.

    • logOutButtonClick

      protected void logOutButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Closes the database connection and returns the user to the login window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - User Event - Controls setOnCloseRequest allowing the user to exit the application if logged out.

    • addAptButtonClicked

      public void addAptButtonClicked()
      Opens the add/update appointment window and sets default values for adding a new appointment. Disables the main window.

    • updateAptButtonClicked

      public void updateAptButtonClicked()
      Opens the add/update appointment window and sets the values to the selected appointment values for updating an appointment. Prompts the user to select an appointment if one isn't selected. Disables the main window.

    • removeAptButtonClicked

      public void removeAptButtonClicked()
      Removes appointment from the appointment table in the client_schedule database. Prompts the user for remove confirmation. Prompts the uesr to select an appointment if one isn't selected.

    • addCustomerButtonClicked

      public void addCustomerButtonClicked()
      Opens the add/update customer and sets the default values. Disables the main window.

    • updateCustomerButtonClicked

      public void updateCustomerButtonClicked()
      opens the add/update customer and sets the values based on the selected customer. Prompts the user to select a customer if one isn't selected. Disables the main window.

    • removeCustomerButtonClicked

      public void removeCustomerButtonClicked()
      Removes customer from the customers table in the client_schedule database. Removes all associated appointments based on user_ID from the appointments table in the client_schedule database. Prompts the user for confirmation to delete the customer and all associated appointments (provides a list of associated appointments).

    • userIdControl

      public void userIdControl()
      Sets the username and ID to the current logged-in user on the add/update appointment window.

    • setAptEndDate

      public void setAptEndDate()
      Sets the appointment end date to the same as the appointment start date on the add/update appointment window.

    • endHrsSelection

      public void endHrsSelection()
      Sets the end hours dropdown list based on the start hours selection on the add/update appointment window.

    • endMinSelection

      public void endMinSelection()
      Sets the end minutes dropdown list based on the start minute selection on the add/update appointment window if start minutes is set.

    • endMinSelectionAfterEndHr

      public void endMinSelectionAfterEndHr()
      Sets the end minutes dropdown list based on the start minute selection on the add/update appointment window if start minutes is NOT set.

    • submitAptButtonClicked

      public void submitAptButtonClicked()
      Commits appointment add or change to the appointments table in the client schedule database. Prompts the user for validation errors if they exist. Executes sql INSERT INTO if adding an appointment and executes sql UPDATE on selected appointment if updating an appointment.

    • cancelAptButtonClicked

      public void cancelAptButtonClicked()
      Closes the add update appointment window without changing or adding an appointment and returns the user to the main window.

    • setAppointment

      public void setAppointment(Appointment selectedApt)
      Sets the add/update appointment window from values based on the selected appointment in the table.
      Parameters:
      selectedApt - The selected appointment from the appointment table view.

    • contactGetIdByName

      public void contactGetIdByName()
      Displays the selected contact name's contact ID on the add/update appointment window.

    • customerGetIdByName

      public void customerGetIdByName()
      Displays the selected customer name's customer ID on the add/update appointment window.

    • cleanAptForm

      public void cleanAptForm()
      Clears values or sets values to default in the add/update appointment window.

    • cancelCustomerButtonClicked

      public void cancelCustomerButtonClicked()
      Closes the add/update customer window and returns user to the main window.

    • submitCustomerButtonClicked

      public void submitCustomerButtonClicked()
      Commits customer add or change to the customers table in the client schedule database. Prompts the user for validation errors if they exist. Executes sql INSERT INTO if adding a customer and executes sql UPDATE on selected customer if updating a customer.

    • setDivisionCountry

      public void setDivisionCountry()
      Future development (not functional) Intended Purposes: If a first level division is selected before a country, the country is auto filled based on the first level division selection in the add/update customer window.

    • setCountry

      public void setCountry()
      Sets the available first level divisions based on the country selection in the add/update customer window.

    • setCustomer

      public void setCustomer(Customer selectedCustomer)
      Sets the add/update customer form values based on the selected customer.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - Selected customer from the customer table view in the main window.

    • cleanCustomerForm

      public void cleanCustomerForm()
      Clears values from the add/update customer window.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the default environment. Displays the login window in english if the system language is english and displays the login form in French if the system language is French.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - File path to the mainWindow.fxml file.
      resources - Passed resources (default null)
